name: AC Love Runner
description:
AC Love Runner

An infinite-runner fan-made game~ ୧(๑•̀⌄•́๑)૭✧

Collect love letters and bananas & save the day!

- Secret true ending

- 4 unlockable characters~

- Leaderboard available! (ง •̀_•́)ง

Character design and story (yeah true story XD) is based on an anime website ACFUN.CN~

As a solo dev, I created all the assets in this game! Hope you enjoy my music!~ 

Try it out!~~
